(I'll be leaving on the 8th to the 20th.  I'll have computer access and 
CompuServe access, but I'm not sure exactly how much time I'll have, so I've 
handed out all of my characters except for Shockwave out to Zardus, JP3884, 
and Inferno731.  I'll be playing Shockwave)



Chordate/Koga Shuko/Unitron/Hades/Anubis/Serpentor/Shockwave:



Chordate sighed.  <Fine, you idiots want to go on a wild goose chase and 
leave a near dead Ark, I ain't going to come and rescue it!>

===

Koga Shuko, Unitron, Hades, Anubis, and Serpentor exited the Newcomer ship, 
waiting.

"Koga Shuko, most of the Maximals have left the Ark."

"Wait till all in that group have left.  With the Ark this damaged, and 
undefended, we'll blow up the Ark!" 

"Uh..are you sure you want to do that?  Won't that kill us all?" Unitron 
asked, concern in his voice.

"Yeah, probably.  But, slag it, we don't have any choice!  We've got to take 
some of these people out!"

"But...what if we all phase out of existence because of it?"

"I said we do it anyways, Anubis!" Shuko yelled, slapping Anubis across the 
face.

===

Shockwave's engines were at full, and he was only a hundred meters from the 
Cybertronian Fire.  This new craft's defenses would have to be tested.
